snippet.title: ShapeGrid - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
A minimalist puzzle in which a hasty decision can cost you the game. Find your way through shapes and colors and don't block yourself.

Coming soon to PC and Android. You can Wishlist on Steam to get notified!

#indiegame #indiegamedev #videojuegos #puzzle #puzzlegame #puzzlegames #indiegamedeveloper
